a-na LUGAL EN-ia ARAD-ka {1}x x x x lu DI-mu a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia ina UGU ša LUGAL EN-li iš-pur-an-ni ma-a {LU₂}GAL-ka-a-ri {LU₂}GAL-ka-a-ri iq-ṭi₂-bi-a ma-a {KUR}E₂-kap-si ša {URU}ki-x x x ša pe-e ša LUGAL EN-ia la ih-ta-an-ša₂ u₂-ma-a ša {LU₂}GAL-ka-a-ri {LU₂}GAL-ka-a-ri x x x LUGAL EN-li liš-ʾa-al lu-ṣi-ṣi x x {LU₂}ERIM-MEŠ 20 x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x i-du-nu x x x x x x x x iq-ṭi₂-bi x x x x x x x x la u₂-še-ši-ib x x x x x x x TA IGI-ia x x x x x x x x {URU}pi-u₂-si x x x x x x x iš-pur-an-ni ma-a x x x x x x x na-gi-u₂ i-x x x x x x x ERIM-MEŠ ša {URU}x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x 01 me i-ba-šu₂-u-ni i-sa-x x x x x x+x re-he a-ra-aš₂ x x x x x x x
